page.title: 19Workers of Laggan
page.content: Most people in the community find unskilled employment in the form of domestic or driving jobs for women and general labouring for men.Skilled trades must be learned outside the village but most people achieve an amazing amount of trade-skills to maintain a high level of self - sufficiency.35% of the male population work on the 4 farms,tending beef cattle,hill sheep and working some hectares of barley,grass and turnips for silage and fodder.20% are in forestry and estate work,15% are self employed(fencing,gardening etc.)2% are crofters working their strip of land.1% are game-keepers.The rest are employed out with the given area or are retired "settlers".80% of the female population work in tourism.
